title: Question:
author: Metaplays
content: Hey Guys i wanted to tell you something about Tycoon.io, must people didnt even know that this Platform exist! Tycoon is a Platform where you can Follow you the Best Traders on Binance with your Crypto Portfolio only with some Clicks and you are Done! The Good Thinks on Tycoon are your Asset are every Time in your Hand and you have fully Control over that! You can see the Performence on Tycoon from every Trader and see how many % the made in same Days , Month etc. Tycoon will launch the new Platform soon. Atm The have a Waitlist where you can join and take a look on this Side.In my Eyes its the easyiest way to Make Passive Money thats Crazy ðŸ¤¯

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Are you trying to advertise for them, if yes then the service board or exchanges is the best board for doing that, regarding business, if they truly have a collaboration together, then he Binance exchange should have their link or icon added to their platform so that people can get onboard through them, please always consod the security involved in joining platforms especially unregulated ones, it's better you learn how to trade and be independent on your own than relying on what they feed you with in cryptocurrency.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: I know Copy trading and all investment including copy trade also has the risk and as far as I know Binance has its own Platfrom and it called traderwagon here the link - https://www.traderwagon.com/en'One of the risk of copy trade is also liquidation and I just hear the platform you mention is just today, do you have other proof to share?

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Metaplays on May 25, 2023, 12:14:10 PMTycoon will launch the new Platform soon. Atm The have a Waitlist where you can join and take a look on this Side.In my Eyes its the easyiest way to Make Passive Money thats Crazy ðŸ¤¯Are they asking for fee or service interaction. Maybe some of them have free trial? Whats the catch about their waitlist? Doing copy trade doesnt mean its guaranteed and also you might encounter some losses too. Copy trade is also risky but with a guidance of professional trader might lower the risk.Are you part of their team or creator?

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Copy trading may work well if there is an experienced copy trader, but it is not successful all the time.There are many platforms that have the service of copy trading, I think that Binance has the same service, so what is the need for a third party to provide the service?
